name: Pantocrator 3D
description:
Slash robots with a katana 

...in this absolutely mindless first-person slasher.

This is the post-jam version of our entry for the 2022 GGJ. And it's a sequel (or prequel?? damned if I know :/) to our 2018 game jam game - Pantocrator! Though you don't have to play that one to get into this one, trust me ;D

Controls : 
  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Dash
  • LMB - Attack
  • RMB - Throw Shuriken
  • Escape -Pause the Game

I've added a mouse sensitivity slider because everyone kept making fun of me for how fast the default was...

Credits :

PS : THE WURM IS IMMORTAL!
